name: logo
label: Logo
description: The logo image used for the theme. Supports .jpg, .jpeg, and .png files.

name: space_1
label: Space 1
description: This setting controls the left space on the top row on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>

label: Space 2
description: This setting controls the right space on the top row on the homepage below the rotator. You can choose from the Content options and any boxes you have made.
input_value: [('','Nothing'),('news_list.html','Featured News with list'),('articles_list.html','Featured Article with list')] #<box_list>
